summary: A recently institutionalized woman has bizarre experiences after moving into a supposedly haunted country farmhouse and fears she may be losing her sanity once again.
cast: Zohra Lampert|Barton Heyman|Kevin O'Connor|Gretchen Corbett|Alan Manson|Mariclare Costello
director: Director: John D. Hancock (as John Hancock)
